name: VR Ramayana (android)
description:
This is my final year college project

The Ramayana is an ancient Indian epic that tells the story of Prince Rama, who is considered an incarnation of the god Vishnu. Rama is married to Sita, who is a embodiment of virtue and devotion. However, Sita is abducted by the demon king, Ravana. Rama, along with his brother Lakshmana and his devotee Hanuman, embark on a journey to rescue Sita from Lanka, where she is held captive by Ravana. Along the way, they face many challenges and make allies. Rama and his allies ultimately defeat Ravana in a great battle and rescue Sita. After the defeat of the demon king and the reunion of Rama and Sita, they return to Ayodhya where Rama is crowned king.and they live happily together. The story of Ramayana is written by the sage Valmiki and it teaches about duty, virtue, loyalty and devotion.

Actually, this is my first time making a game. I learned to make a game only by watching YouTube. While most of my assets are free, some I had to buy, but most of the 2D assets I made myself
